cvs -d:pserver:anonymous@...:/cvsroot/cantera login

#to check out
cvs -z3 -d:pserver:anonymous@...:/cvsroot/cantera co  
cantera

#to update
cvs -z3 -d:pserver:anonymous@...:/cvsroot/cantera update

Once it is checked out/updated, then go to the cantera directory, run
./configure
then
make
then
make install

I think that is all that you need to to.

Good luck.

Karl




On Jan 27, 2006, at 6:25 PM, jocie_squirl wrote:

> I would like to update my version of Cantera using the CVS system,  
> but I was unsure which
> files I should download.  I am currently on a Mac running OS X.3.   
> I also can't seem to find
> the documentation for building from scratch for a Mac, so if anyone  
> could help me with
> the commands, I would really appreciate it.  Thanks so much!
